    • Uses of InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization.plugin

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization.plugin with annotations of type InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HiveAccessControlException
      Exception thrown by the Authorization plugin api (v2).
      interface  HiveAuthorizationTranslator
      This interface has functions that provide the ability to customize the translation from Hive internal representations of Authorization objects to the public API objects This is an interface that is not meant for general use, it is targeted to some specific use cases of Apache Sentry (incubating).
      interface  HiveAuthorizer
      Interface for hive authorization plugins.
      interface  HiveAuthorizerFactory
      Implementation of this interface specified through hive configuration will be used to create HiveAuthorizer instance used for hive authorization.
      class  HiveAuthorizerImpl
      Convenience implementation of HiveAuthorizer.
      class  HiveAuthzContext
      Provides context information in authorization check call that can be used for auditing and/or authorization.
      class  HiveAuthzPluginException
      Exception thrown by the Authorization plugin api (v2).
      class  HiveAuthzSessionContext
      Provides session context information.
      interface  HiveMetastoreClientFactory
      Factory for getting current valid instance of IMetaStoreClient Metastore client cannot be cached in authorization interface as that can get invalidated between the calls with the logic in Hive class.
      class  HiveOperationType
      List of hive operations types.
      class  HivePrincipal
      Represents the user or role in grant/revoke statements
      class  HivePrivilege
      Represents the hive privilege being granted/revoked
      class  HivePrivilegeInfo
      Represents a privilege granted for an object to a principal
      class  HivePrivilegeObject
      Represents the object on which privilege is being granted/revoked, and objects being used in queries.
      class  HivePrivilegeObjectUtils
      Utility functions for working with HivePrivilegeObject
      class  HiveRoleGrant
      Represents a grant of a role to a principal
      class  SettableConfigUpdater
      Helper class that can be used by authorization implementations to set a default list of 'safe' HiveConf parameters that can be edited by user.

    • Uses of InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate in org.apache.hive.http

      Methods in org.apache.hive.http with annotations of type InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean HttpServer.isInstrumentationAccessAllowed(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Checks the user has privileges to access to instrumentation servlets.
      static boolean HttpServer.isInstrumentationAccessAllowedStrict(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Same as HttpServer.isInstrumentationAccessAllowed(ServletContext, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) except that it returns true only if hadoop.security.instrumentation.requires.admin is set to true.
